title: TechFest 2025
description: An intercollegiate technical festival showcasing projects, coding contests, and workshops.

title: Cultural Week 2025
description: A vibrant week-long celebration with dance, drama, music, and art exhibitions.

title: Departmental Hackathon
description: A 12-hour coding hackathon organized by the IT department.

title: Annual Sports Meet
description: Athletics, football, basketball, and other intercollegiate competitions.

title: Alumni Talk Series
description: Distinguished alumni share their career journeys and provide guidance to current students.
